Back To Recipes

recipe

Get out the following ingredients:

brown rice 1 cup
water 1.5 cup
kale 1 unit
black beans 2 Tbsp
chilli oil 2 Tbsp
curry powder 0.5 Tbsp
buffalo sauce 1.5 Tbsp
Show Ingrendients

Estimated Time: 58 Minutes

Recipe:

Add the following to an instant pot
> 1 cup brown rice
> 1½ cups water
| Pressure cook on high pressure for 15 minutes, (Preheat takes 9 min) (Takes 24 minutes)
| Wait (Takes 19 minutes)
Put away brown rice
Wash kale
Rinse 2 Tbsp black beans in sink with strainer (So bean juice doesnt get on counter)
Preheat pan on heat 7 (Takes 5 minutes)
     |- Add the following to a pan
     |- > 2 Tbsp chilli oil
     |- > kale
| Pan sautee kale (Takes 5 minutes)
Put kale away
Let instant pot sit without opening steam valve (Takes 5 minutes)
Open steam valve
Mix in ½ Tbsp curry powder with rice
Take inner instant pot bowl out and put on stove. Put away instant pot.
In a bowl mix black beans brown rice kale 1½ Tbsp buffalo sauce
